extendedInfo.description: Sylvester Stallone Soundboard.  Funny sounds and phrases from Sly Stallone himself famous for movies such as Rocky, Rambo, Demolition Man, and others.  Be a tough guy and have fun with this soundboard.  Soundboard sounds can be saved as ringtones, notification, and alarm ringtones.Sylvester StalloneSoundboardRingtonesNotificationAlarmRockyRamboDemolition manFunnySoundsMovies that Sylvester Stallone has appeared in:2010 The Expendables Barney Ross2008 Rambo John Rambo2006 Rocky Balboa Rocky Balboa2003 Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over Toymaker2003/I Shade Dean 'The Dean' Stevens2002 Avenging Angelo Frankie Delano2002 D-Tox Jake Malloy2001 Driven Joe Tanto2000 Get Carter Jack Carter1998 Antz Weaver (voice)1997 Cop Land Freddy Heflin1997 The Good Life Boss1996 Daylight Kit Latura1995 Assassins Robert Rath1995 Judge Dredd Judge Joseph Dredd1994 The Specialist Ray Quick1993 Demolition Man John Spartan1993 Cliffhanger Gabe Walker1992 Stop! Or My Mom Will Shoot Sgt. Joe Bomowski1991 Oscar Angelo 'Snaps' Provolone1990 Rocky V Rocky Balboa1989 Tango & Cash Lt.
